alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 09 at 9:08AM EDT until April 10 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EDT MONDAY... ...PREVIOUS FREEZE WARNING FOR THIS MORNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Frederick MD, Carroll, Northern Baltimore, Northwest Montgomery, Northwest Howard and Northwest Harford Counties. In Virginia, Eastern Loudoun and Northwest Prince William Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery
